meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Katie Grosteffon Adam Lozeau James Holzhauer Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7972.

td.p: Katie Grosteffon, an ergonomist from Lexington, Kentucky
Adam Lozeau, a public defender from Saint Paul, Minnesota
James Holzhauer, a professional sports gambler from Las Vegas, Nevada (whose 8-day cash winnings total $460,479)

tr.td: A YEAR ENDING IN 9
ALSO A FIRST NAME
A THURBER CARNIVAL OF QUOTATIONS
BEHIND THE SCENES
5 JEFFS
YEAH, WE SAW IT ON THE INTERNET

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: James
Adam
Katie
CANADIAN CITY NICKNAMES
PRESS YOUR LUCK
LITERARY ALLUSIONS
BOYS IN THE BAND
SOUNDS LIKE PIG LATIN
THE FRANKLIN INSTITUTE
(Kelly: Philadelphia's Franklin Institute. Some of Ben's discoveries and a little of what scientists have been up to since his time.)

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
